page.title: 19CHINESE PREMIER LIVINGSTON
page.content: On Wednesday, 5th June 1985,{Zhao {Ziyang, premier of the Chinese Peoples {Republic,}visited Ferranti Infographics on Brucefield Industrial Estate. Ferranti makes computer software. Last year our Prime Minister ,Mrs. Margaret Thatcher, visited China and presented Mr. Zhao with a word processor in Chinese, which had been made by Ferranti. This is the first time a Chinese premier has visited Scotland and British industrialists are hoping to have more trading links with China. Bellsquarry School went to see him. The Union Jack and the Chinese flag were flying and a policeman told us we could stand closer to get a better view. Mr. Zhao arrived with an escort of 16 police motor cyclists, 2 white Rovers and 3 black Jaguars. We cheered loudly. He turned round and waved to us.
